mutants.code:
import re

def find_palindromes(sentence):
    words = re.findall('', sentence)
    palindromes = [word for word in words if word == word[::-1]]
    return palindromes

mutants.original_line: palindromes = [word for word in words if word == word[::-1]]
mutants.mutated_line: palindromes = [word for word in words if word != word[::-1]]

import re

def find_palindromes(sentence):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    palindromes = [word for word in words if word != word[::-1]]
    return palindromes

mutants.original_line: palindromes = [word for word in words if word == word[::-1]]
mutants.mutated_line: palindromes = [word for word in words if word == word[::+1]]

def find_palindromes(sentence):
